Oct. 27, 1956 D National Championship of Great Britain (Fourth Section Final)
National Championship of Great Britain (Fourth Section Final) 40 Test Piece Contest National Championship of Great Britain (Finals) national-finals-fourth-section
Fourth
Three Songs without Words
Lime Grove Hall, Shepherd's Bush, Hammersmith and Fulham, Greater London, England, UK Coal Magazine Report here: http://www.dmm-gallery.org.uk/coalmag/5612a.htm 1st Prize: £40, 2nd £25, 3rd Prize: £15, 4th £8. 17 bands competed.
